thread.title: Man Starts Gas Station Blaze Trying to Kill Spider with Lighter
thread.title_full: Man Starts Gas Station Blaze Trying to Kill Spider with Lighter

title: Man Starts Gas Station Blaze Trying to Kill Spider with Lighter
text: Subscribe Man Starts Gas Station Blaze Trying to Kill Spider with Lighter A man tried to kill a spider at a gas station using a lighter, causing a dangerous fire, Fox 2 Detroit reported. September 28, 2015 CENTER LINE, Mich. â€” A man tried to kill a spider at a gas station using a lighter causing a dangerous fire, Fox 2 Detroit reported . He somehow escaped serious injury and the gas station's damage was contained to one pump, which was destroyed. The incident was recorded at a Center Line gas station. Employee Susan Adams kept calm and hit the gas automatic stop button and quickly called the Center Line fire department, Fox 2 Detroit reported . The man grabbed a nearby extinguisher and put out the flames before firefighters arrived. Later he admitted what he did, saying he spotted a spider on his gas tank and because he's deathly afraid of the critters.
